set(INC
	Include
)

set(INC_SYS

)

set(SRC
	Source/colamd.c
	Source/colamd_global.c

	Include/colamd.h
	Include/UFconfig.h
)

blender_add_lib(extern_colamd "${SRC}" "${INC}" "${INC_SYS}")
